MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Site_Title: Gestalt KeyLogger records all the keys pressed on the comput
Site.Site_Description_100: Records all the keys pressed on the computer and the time it was pressed.
Site.Site_Description_250: Gestalt KeyLogger records all the keys pressed on the computer, the time it was pressed, and the names of the applications in which these keys were pressed.
Site.Site_Description_450: Gestalt KeyLogger is an easy-to-use tool to record keyboard and monitor keystrokes on your own computer. It can track activities of other people using your keyboard without your permission. Gestalt KeyLogger runs in invisible mode automatically after Windows starts up.
Site.Site_Keywords: keyboard tracer, keyboard logger, record keypresses, record keystrokes, keyboard monitor, keyboard log, keyboard spy, record keys, keyboard tracking software, keyboard logger for windows

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Win2000,WinXP,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Windows 8,Windows 10,WinServer,WinOther,Windows2000,Windows2003,Windows Server 2000,Windows Server 2003,Windows Server 2008,Windows Server 2008r2,Windows Server 2012,Windows Tablet PC Edition 2005,Windows Media Center Edition 2005,WinVista,Windows Vista Starter,Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium,Windows Vista Business,Windows Vista Enterprise,Windows Vista Ultimate,WinVista x64,Windows Vista Home Basic x64,Windows Vista Home Premium x64,Windows Vista Business x64,Windows Vista Enterprise x64,Windows Vista Ultimate x64
Program_Info.Limitations: Unregistered version displays activity only for the previous 10 days.

English.Keywords: keyboard tracer, keyboard logger, record keypresses, record keystrokes, keyboard monitor, keyboard log, keyboard spy, record keys, keyboard tracking software, keyboard logger for windows
English.Char_Desc_45: Records all the keys pressed on the computer.
English.Char_Desc_80: Records all the keys pressed on the computer and the time it was pressed.
English.Char_Desc_250: Gestalt KeyLogger records all the keys pressed on the computer, the time it was pressed, and the names of the applications in which these keys were pressed.
English.Char_Desc_450: Gestalt KeyLogger is an easy-to-use tool to record keyboard and monitor keystrokes on your own computer. It can track activities of other people using your keyboard without your permission. Gestalt KeyLogger runs in invisible mode automatically after Windows starts up.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Gestalt KeyLogger is an easy-to-use tool to record keyboard and monitor keystrokes on your own computer. It can track activities of other people using your keyboard without your permission. Gestalt KeyLogger runs in invisible mode automatically after Windows starts up.
Do you wonder what your spouse, your kids, or your employees are doing on the computer when you are not around? Do they hide windows as you walk by? If you want to know every word, every web page, and every program used then Gestalt KeyLogger is for you.
Gestalt KeyLogger will record everything typed on the keyboard. Gestalt KeyLogger not only captures standard alphanumeric keystrokes, but also captures "hidden" characters and keystroke combinations, such as the Shift and Ctrl key, as well as "true" keystrokes which may other-wise appear differently on screen (such as an * when a password is typed).
With Gestalt KeyLogger, you will know what keystrokes were typed, where and when the they were typed, and you will also know WHO typed it because Gestalt KeyLogger keeps a record of who is logged into the computer.
Key Features - Logs all the keyboard events, including function keys such as F1, Home etc. - Perfect logger interface - Built-in intelligent logger engine, very very low CPU & memory consuming
